title: Boost Your Immune System
author: Contributor Ulrike Sujansky; M D Mills-Peninsula Medical Center
description: Focus on nutrient-rich foods, regular exercise and adequate sleep to improve your odds of warding off the common cold, flu and other illnesses.
cleaned_text: Do you ever make it through an entire year without getting sick? Staying healthy year-round, even during the fall and winter months, isn't as hard as you might think. "There are plenty of ways you can help protect your body from colds and the flu, starting with the foods you eat," says Ulrike Sujansky, M.D., an internal medicine doctor with Mills-Peninsula Medical Center.
